Text: Finally, Zacks Investment Research raised shares of Chart Industries from a hold rating to a buy rating and set a $68.00 price target for the company in a research report on Thursday, September 5th. One equities research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, two have issued a hold rating and six have assigned a buy rating to the stock. The stock currently has a consensus rating of Buy and an average target price of $82.59.
